about_the_game:
This first-person horror detective adventure!
Go to the abandoned mental hospital and photograph spirits, collect notes, build a chain of events and at the end of the game answer questions related to the events that occurred in this hospital.
In this game you have to walk, take pictures, collect notes, it is a horror walking simulator with the ability to take pictures of hidden objects.
FEAUTURES:
- Retro style graphics with modern post process techniques.
- PhotoCamera mode that allows you to see hidden objects inside the game (your photos are saved on your computer).
- Interesting plot.
- Horror atmosphere with a world that changes around you.
- A short experience, like watching a movie.


The plot:
The year is 1999, you're a Spiritgrapher, a journalist who's dedicated his life to the supernatural.
Your camera is able to see beyond the capabilities of the human eye. You can use it to see and photograph ghosts.
This time you go to an abandoned hospital rumored to be haunted.
Your task is to find out if it is true, to make all the necessary photos, and at the end to put together a story that happened in this hospital.

Gameplay:
Take pictures of the ghosts (the pictures are saved to your computer), collect notes with bits of story.
This is a paranormal photojournalist simulator.

content_descriptors.notes: There are images of blood and corpses in the game.

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-13600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

short_description: This first-person horror detective. You are a spiritgrapher, your camera can see what is beyond the reach of the human eye. Head to an abandoned hospital and shoot a report about supernatural events.
